Interface QuestionForm.QuestionFormListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener<String,QuestionForm,Question>, Serializable

    QuestionForm

    public static interface QuestionForm.QuestionFormListener
extends EventListener<String,QuestionForm,Question>
    QuestionFormListener interface for listening to QuestionForm Events.

    1.01
